member.name: M:safewalk.ISafewalkAuthClient.Authenticate(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Authenticates the user with the given credentials.
The username will determine if the user is an internal user or an LDAP user. If the given username has the format of "username" the user will be created as an internal user(In the database). If it doesn't exist, it will look in the LDAP following the priority order If the given username has the format of "username@domain"; the user will be created in the LDAP with the given domain.

member.name: F:safewalk.ReplyCode.OTP_REQUIRED
member.sumary: OTP required. This is the case where the user has a token with password required enabled (2 Step authentication).

member.name: F:safewalk.ReplyCode.DEVICE_OUT_OF_SYNC
member.sumary: The device (token) is out of sync
